name: ComicBACHICoooN!!
description:
Grab it, turn it, hit it, and complete the manga! !

In "Comic Bachicon!!", a player who has become a very popular manga artist is trying to complete his manuscript.
Characters that jumped out from the world of manga are thrown into frames.
It's an action game where you complete a manuscript! !
Hit the characters everywhere, including the pieces and the ground! !

Exhilarating hitting action!


Grab it, turn it, and hit it! !

Hit all the pieces in the stage and aim for completion!



"Comic Bachicon!!" is a manga artist's rampage that is an exhilarating puzzle action game!
You can compete with other manga artists (users) in the ranking for the high score of the stage!
Aim for the highest circulation number - high score - and complete your manga!

Synopsis

Very popular manga artist (planned) new manga artist Kotori Saotome!
Become “Otome Tori Kotori” in her mind and complete the manga!
A story about how to meet the deadline and become a popular manga artist!

Can you complete the manga by the deadline? !

Character introduction


Kotori Saotome (right):
Kotori Saotome, 22 years old, is drawing manga while attending university!
She has an otaku and quiet personality, and the active ``maiden bird Kotori'' in her brain helps her create her manga.
Complete the manga in her mind and aim for a blockbuster series!!

Maiden Tori Kotori (left):
Kotori Kotori is helping “Kotori Saotome” create manga in her mind!
Grab the manga characters scattered in your brain, spin them, and smash them into frames!
She is active and completes the manga with her exhilarating movements!
